gemini_cli_task.context: We are building "SmartChrome", an Auto-Evolving OSINT VLM Agent. This task focuses on Phase 5: The OSINT Analyzer (`C_08_OSINT_ANALYZER`). When the VLM reaches its target data, it will scrape raw HTML/Text. We need a Python endpoint to accept this messy data and use a Teacher LLM to deduplicate, analyze, and format it into a professional Markdown brief.

phase_1_project_management.description: Save this prompt to the SmartChrome GitHub repo.

actions.action: Save this entire XML prompt text into a new file located at: `~/SmartChrome/tasks/task_015_osint_analyzer.xml`
Execute: `git commit -m "task: add osint analyzer prompt"`
Create a new file `osint_analyzer.py` (or add to `vlm_server.py`).
Use the `openai` SDK (configured via `TEACHER_API_KEY` and `TEACHER_BASE_URL`) to call the Teacher LLM (e.g., DeepSeek/Qwen).

System Prompt: "You are an expert OSINT Analyst. Your objective is: {objective}. Here is raw, unstructured data scraped by an autonomous agent: {raw_data}. Deduplicate this information, extract the core insights, and generate a professional, well-structured Markdown brief."
Save the LLM's Markdown response to `~/SmartChrome/backend/reports/osint_brief_{timestamp}.md`.
Return a success message and the file path in the HTTP response.

gemini_cli_task.execution_directive: Execute Phase 1 to secure the record, then execute Phase 2.
